edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.tiedmixture

Class PrunableMixtureComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.MixtureComponent
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.tiedmixture.PrunableMixtureComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class PrunableMixtureComponent
extends MixtureComponent
    Mixture component with partial score computation result. Allows to skip score computing if temporary score reaches provided threshold
    See Also:
